page.title: 16KERRY THOMAS'S DAY
page.content: ON A NORMAL SCHOOL DAY IUSUALLY WAKE UP AT 6 O'CLOCK AND GO DOWNSTAIRS TO FEED THE CAT ,OR LET HER OUT. I GO BACK TO BED AND SLEEP UNTIL 8 O'CLOCK.I GET UP AT 8.15 OR SOMETIMES EARLIER.I HAVE A WASH AND BRUSH MY TEETH AND THEN I GET DRESSED.I USUALLY WEAR A DRESS. I THEN GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE BREAKFAST OF TOAST OR CEREAL AND HAVE A DRINK OF BREAKFAST ORANGE JUICE. WHEN THE TIME IS 8.35 I GO ROUND TO MY FRIEND'S HOUSE AND HAVE A LIFT IN THEIR CAR TO SCHOOL ,WHICH STARTS AT 8.50A.M. AFTER WE HAVE FINISHED SCHOOL AT 3.30 I GO HOME AND PLAY UNTIL 5 P.M. WHEN WE USUALLY HAVE TEA. AFTER TEA I PRACTISE PLAYING MY CORNET AND THEN AT 9.30 P.M. AFTER WATCHING SOME TELEVISION , I GO TO BED.
